description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing resume data in a front-end application, including state initialization, setters for updating data, and methods for manipulating arrays within the state.

methods.name: setField
methods.description: Updates a nested field within the resume data at the specified path.

methods.name: addArrayItem
methods.description: Adds an item to an array field within the resume data, using default empty items for specific keys.

methods.name: removeArrayItem
methods.description: Removes an item at a specified index from an array within the resume data.

methods.name: setArrayItem
methods.description: Sets the value of an array item at a specific index within the resume data.

methods.name: setStep
methods.description: Updates the current step in the resume creation process.

methods.name: setAtsScore
methods.description: Updates the ATS score value and feedback list.

ctags.name: emptyItem
ctags.pattern: /^const emptyItem = () => ({ title: '', subtitle: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', description: '' /
